price: 59. Diggah Yalli yakcineeniih edde leedan arac ken culsele (Jannat kinnuk), kaadu diggah Yalli kay gitah yawqe mara yaaxigi, Kay gita cine marah xiqliiy digaaláh keenit mayasissika.
arabic: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
